paragraph: We have been providing software engineering services from
our headquarters in Ensenada, Baja California, Mexico
since January 2014.

discovery.title: Discovery
hero: Discover the path towards a unique software solution for your business
with our Discovery service, make informed decisions and maximize your
time with consistent delivery of prototypes.
discovery.intro: In the pre-development phase of a project, we constantly analyze and redefine the general objective by identifying obstacles that help us plot a viable implementation route. We use a similar methodology to that used to build the software, but without sending the artifacts to development, thereby reducing the risks associated with this idea generation stage.

sections.title: Rapid Prototyping
sections.par1: We use Rapid Prototyping to deliver constant deliveries of a prototype, with the views and scenarios that constitute the software solution, maximizing the time.

sections.title: Ad-Hoc Discovery
sections.par1: We use the Ad-Hoc Discovery technique when we develop a tailor-made plan, involving one or more requirements analysis and prototyping techniques that clarify the way for the business and in many cases propose a viable route for the implementation of the solution.

methodologies.title: specialized methodologies
methodologies.content: We use specialized methodologies to develop initial software prototypes in the form of a collection of artifacts. This allows us to make informed decisions about the path to take for new business capabilities or optimizing processes, all with an agile technology project ready

wireframe.par1: In a period of 2 to 4 weeks, our multidisciplinary teams can create wireframes or prototypes, a map of functionality, a logical architecture of the solution, and a release plan for its construction.
wireframe.par2: With this methodology, we can identify and define problems, develop prototypes, and plan the development of software with a focus on the business and functionality.

agile.title: Agile Development
agile.ogDescription: Our main service offers iteration of work by a multidisciplinary engineering team in charge of designing the architecture and building the solution of the software from the ideation to the end of the lifecycle.
hero: Our main service offers iteration of work by a multidisciplinary
engineering team in charge of designing the architecture and
building the solution of the software from the ideation to the
intro: Our projects are based on iterations that include three phases: DEFINITION, IMPLEMENTATION,
Iterations are put into a FIXED GANTT CHART that provides flexibility and predictability in
agile.intro2: We organize our team in DEFINITION and IMPLEMENTATION groups using our custom methodology that is supported over different production-tested techniques for requirement analysis, user-interface design, versioning, code arquitectura, and delivery. At the end of the implementation, the result is delivered to our clients in proper staging environments so they can perform their ACCEPTANCE tests. We accomplish this through proprietary versioning mechanisms and perfected continuous integration mechanisms.

sections.title: MAAD
sections.par1: We created the Analysis and Design Agile Methodology, a collection of activities that allows us to capture the stakeholders' requirements and transform them into a backlog with short, clear, concise and actionable elements.
sections.par2: The methodology standardizes the collecting of requirements and process them into entities like epics, stories and deltas that clearly describe the changes to be implemented.
sections.par3: Each backlog element has a strict but simplified state that can be monitored using tools like Jira and Confluence.

sections.title: flare
sections.par1: We employ a proprietary design system that allows for a fast inception and efficient implementation of interfaces with perfect grids and consistent styles since the first iteration. Flare defines clear and implementable concepts on four key points: style, structure, user interface and content.

sections.title: scrum
sections.par1: The use of Scrum as a framework allows us to approach complex problems while valuable, continuous and constant deliveries are done in a creative manner and focused on increasing team productivity. Based on the CMMI model, we implement good practices that allow us to increase and optimize performance of the processes directly and indirectly involved in software development, maximizing opportunities and mitigating risks.

sections.title: agile flow
sections.par1: We design our own versioning mechanisms that are robust, flexible and compatible with industry standards. These processes, combined with our continuous integration mechanisms, allow us to reach maximum development speeds, maintaining full control over the quality of each of the components involved and their integrations.

sections.title: cd/ci
sections.par1: Our source code is managed using proprietary continuous integration infrastructure that automates binary versioning, packaging and release.
sections.par2: The entire automation of our DevOps processes allows us to deliver functional versions to our clients at the end of each iteration.

span.forward: AGILE MAINTENANCE, SCOPE DEV. & CONTINUOUS SUPPORT

ams.title: Agile Maintenance
ams.ogDescription: Maintenance and support: guaranteeing the stability of your platform.
hero: Maintenance and support: guaranteeing the stability of your
ams.intro: Once the development is finished, we offer maintenance and support services to guarantee the stability and successful transfer of the platform to your business. We have three maintenance modalities: Scope Development, Agile maintenance and Continuous Support. These types of projects follow the same internal development processes with administrative and operational variants in favor of efficient use of resources.

title: as an agile framework
content: We employ Kanban as an agile workframe to prioritize and organize planned and on-call work, which allows us to maintain a constant flow of deliverables, through the implementation of solutions that immediately provide value to the client.

sections.title: SCOPE DEVELOPMENT
sections.par1: This option is offered to existing clients when, after finishing the initial development phase, SPECIFIC REQUIREMENTS arise. Here we analyze requirements in detail, employing techniques taken from agile methodologies before hiring the services.

sections.title: AGILE MAINTENANCE
sections.par1: Once the platform is developed, our maintenance blocks offer an AGILE alternative to perfect or complement the existing functionality. We use Kanban with the methodologies employed for development in flexible maintenance projects from one week and with no duration limit.

sections.title: CONTINUOUS SUPPORT
sections.par1: We offer continuous support options for the solutions that we develop. Our teams provide support to platforms with several SLAs and regular-time and on-call coverage. The stability of our development combined with our processes guarantee efficiency and operational costs under control.

ams.conclusion: Whether through Scope Development, Agile Maintenance or Continuous Support, we are committed to offering you a continuous and quality service that guarantees the stability and efficiency of your platform.

privacy.intro: LKMX SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT, better known as LKMX, located at Av. Adolfo López Mateos 2030-15, Granados, 22840, Ensenada, B.C., Mexico and website https://www.lkmx.io/, is responsible for the use and protection of your personal data, and we hereby inform you of the following:

section1.title: FOR WHAT PURPOSES WILL WE USE YOUR PERSONAL DATA?
section1.paragraph: The personal data we collect from you will be used for the following purposes that are necessary for the service you request:

section2.title: WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL WE USE FOR THESE PURPOSES?
section2.paragraph: To carry out the purposes described in this privacy notice, we will use the following personal data:

section3.title: HOW CAN YOU ACCESS, RECTIFY OR CANCEL YOUR PERSONAL DATA, OBJECT TO ITS USE OR EXERCISE YOUR RIGHT TO REVOKE CONSENT?
paragraph: You have the right to know what personal data we have about you, what we use it for and the conditions of its use (
Access
). Likewise, you have the right to request the correction of your personal information if it is outdated, inaccurate or incomplete (
Rectification
); that we remove it from our records or databases when you consider that it is not being used properly (
Cancellation
); as well as to object to the use of your personal data for specific purposes (
Objection
). These rights are known as
ARCO rights.
paragraph2: you must send a request via email to
li: Copy of an official identification attached.

Description of the purpose of the letter, which may be, among others, the following: Revocation of consent to process your personal data; and/or Notification of improper use of your personal data processing; and/or Exercise your ARCO rights, with a clear and precise description of the data to be Accessed, Rectified, Canceled or Objected to. In the case of Rectification of personal data, you must indicate the exact modification and attach supporting documentation; it is important to note that in the case of revocation of consent, we may not be able to immediately attend to your request or discontinue the use, as it is possible that by some legal obligation we may need to continue processing your personal data. Also, you should consider that for certain purposes, the revocation of your consent will imply that we cannot continue to provide you with the service you requested, or the termination of your relationship with us.

section4.title: WITHIN HOW MANY DAYS WILL WE RESPOND TO YOUR REQUEST?

section5.title: HOW WILL WE COMMUNICATE THE RESPONSE TO YOUR REQUEST?
section5.paragraph: To the same email from where the request was sent.

section6.title: THE USE OF TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES ON OUR WEBSITE
section6.paragraph: We inform you that we use cookies, web beacons, or other technologies on our website, through which it is possible to monitor your behavior as an internet user, as well as to provide you with a better service and experience while browsing our site. Some of the personal data we obtain from these tracking technologies are:
section6.paragraph2: These cookies, web beacons, and other technologies can be disabled. To learn how to do it, please consult your browser's help menu. Please note that if you disable cookies, you may not be able to access certain personalized features on our website.

section7.title: HOW CAN YOU KNOW ABOUT CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY NOTICE?
section7.paragraph: This privacy notice may be modified, changed or updated due to new legal requirements, our own needs for the products or services we offer, our privacy practices, changes in our business model, or other reasons. We undertake to keep this privacy notice updated regarding any changes it may undergo, and you can always check for updates on the website
